description: Complete NFL Draft experience system with combine measurables, 130+ colleges, college stats/accolades, pre-draft interviews, combine/pro day events, full draft day UI with trades, and rookie camp integration
goal: Transform the stub draft page into an elite, immersive draft experience that rivals console franchise games - covering the full journey from scouting season through rookie camp
requirements: Full NFL Combine measurables system (40-yard, vertical, broad jump, 3-cone, shuttle, bench, arm length, hand size, wingspan)
Expanded college database with 130+ schools across 5 tiers (Blue Blood, Elite, Power 5, Group of 5, FCS)
College career stats and accolades (Heisman, All-American, position awards, bowl MVPs)
Pre-draft interview system with character/IQ/work ethic reveals
Combine week simulation (Week 19) with risers/fallers and storylines
Pro Day events (Week 20) with school visits and private workouts
Draft day UI with pick ticker, draft board, team needs panel, trade mechanics
7-round draft with 224 picks plus compensatory system
Trade up/down mechanics with value chart
Rookie camp integration with OVR reveal and development assignment
constraints: Must integrate with existing scouting-store and its point system
Must work with current dev-player-store roster structure
Must follow existing UI patterns (Tailwind, shadcn components)
No backend changes - all client-side with Zustand stores
Prospect generation must work with existing draft-generator.ts patterns
